urls.description: Increasing Governmental requirements concerning Passenger Data, hig hlights the need for accurate recording of Name information. Ideally, the recorded name should match the details in an official Travel document, e.g. Passport. As this may not always be possible, the following guidelines shall be used: Enter the family name in the last name field and the given name (first and middle) in the first name field.
